page.title: 12SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: We usually hold our Sports Day on the last Monday of the Summer Term. Both teams,Davy(red) and Trevithick (blue) try hard to win the Cup,which was given by the people of the village. Reds wanted to beat Blues especially this year,because Blues had already won the Swimming Gala.We have no Sports Field, but a farmer kindly lets us use a field near the school.A parent cuts the grass,but we have to watch for thistles and cow dung.It is good fun with running,sack,egg and spoon,bean bag and obstacle races for each age.This year we had a Mums' and Dads' race.Twenty mothers ran in their event.We finished with boys and girls throwing and shuttle relays for each class.Reds won the Cup.
